item.title: Best Quotes App on Android
item.description: If you are looking for motivation and inspiration, there is no other thing in the world like a Quote. Timeless words which will always mean something and bring out the best in you. Here are my listing for best quotes app on Android Play Store. [Quoted: Quotes With Images] (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.classandobjects.quoted) This app lets you explore quotes and images. You can then easily save, share and use this images as wallpaper.
